title: Tabla Maestro Zakir Hussain dies due to health complications
byline: World-renowned tabla maestro Zakir Hussain passed away on Monday at a hospital in San Francisco, his family confirmed. He was 73 years old.

title: Prez holds talks with Indian External Affairs and Finance Ministers
byline: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake who arrived in India yesterday held talks with Indian External Affairs Minister Dr.S. Jaishankar and Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharama New Delhi.

title: Diplomatic gaffes embarrass Lanka’s friendly nations: Sunday Times
byline: A huge diplomatic gaffe came to pass this week when Prime Minister Dr. Harini Amarasuriya thanked Taiwan, China’s arch-enemy, for an “incredibly generous donation” given—and said so in the presence of the Chinese Ambassador Qi Zhenhong to boot, the Sunday Times reported.
